title: Rock Creek Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger          Junior Ranger Activity Books Learn about the park and become an official Junior Ranger! Rock Creek Park Junior Ranger booklets are available at the Nature Center, Peirce Mill, and Old Stone House.  Available Junior Ranger Books  Junior Ranger Activity Book: Designed for ages 6-8. Advanced Junior Ranger Book: Designed for Ages 9 and over. You may also download a booklet by clicking here. Special Civil War 150th Anniversary Junior Ranger booklets are also available at the Nature Center.
